channel.title: Hetzner News
channel.description: In the news section you will find all the latest news about the products and the company Hetzner Online.

item.title: New dedicated vCPU cloud servers with AMD Epyc™ cpus at a sensational price!
item.content:encoded:
23. August 2023

We would like to introduce you to our latest line of six dedicated vCPU Cloud servers.

item.title: New Dedicated Server DX182 and DX293 with Dell namebrand hardware
item.content:encoded:
25. July 2023

With the DX182 and DX293, Hetzner has unveiled two new dedicated servers based on tried and true Dell hardware, making them a cut above the rest.

item.title: Upgrade to the future: The new AX102 Dedicated Server with AMD Ryzen™ 9 7950X3D
item.content:encoded:
13. April 2023

The new AX102 Dedicated Server is the shiny two-sided coin in our collection.

item.title: Rethink your cloud. Rely on our new arm64 CAX servers
item.content:encoded:
12. April 2023

Creating a cloud server has never been so easy and cheap.

item.title: New dedicated servers for almost any use case
item.content:encoded:
15. March 2023

Hetzner’s simulataneously launching three new powerful dedicated servers, and all of them at unbeatable prices! The new EX101 Dedicated Server from the EX line houses the high-end Intel® i9-13900 processor and…

item.title: HETZNER CONTINUES ITS GROWTH IN THE US WITH A NEW LOCATION
item.content:encoded:
5. December 2022

Hetzner, the German hosting and cloud provider, officially launched its second location in the USA for cloud products in Hillsboro, Oregon, just outside of Portland, a location ripe for future…

item.title: Cyber Deals: Hetzner Storage Shares and Dedicated Server AX101 in the spotlight
item.content:encoded:
25. November 2022

This year, we’re offering you a duo of deals: Cyber Deals 2022! Starting on 28 November 2022 at 8:00 am (CET), you can order one of 2022 Hetzner Storage Shares and…

item.title: RX-Line: Pushing the envelop of parallelization
item.content:encoded:
19. July 2022

The new RX-line is now available and features the first Ampere® Altra® Arm-based dedicated servers in Europe.

item.title: Hetzner Cloud: Flexible Networking
item.content:encoded:
28. June 2022

Three different network options are now available for cloud servers! When you create a cloud server, it will no longer automatically include public IP addresses (IPv4, IPv6).

item.title: 25 years of Hetzner - join the fun & win one of 25 prizes!
item.content:encoded:
1. June 2022

We're celebrating 25 years of being your home for the Internet.
